summary: Customization too the Breton race to brings back the stats of Morrowind as I felt like the Breton is lacking as a anti-mage race like it was in ES-3.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a customization too the Breton race to brings back the stats of Morrowind as I felt like the Breton is lacking as a anti-mage race like it was in ES-3.
The Breton Race now has 50% magic resist as it did in ES-3 Morrowind. Starting stats are re-vamped in magic and melee combat. Magic regeneration is slightly increased also.

Use with the latest update of Skyrim, no DLC required.
author: Aceliip
